author: Staff Reporter
text:
A private bus was set on fire by an irate mob after it hit two persons riding a two-wheeler at Ariyur near here on Monday.

Shanmugavel (27) of Keezhur and Dakshinamurthy (42) of Kalmandapam were riding a two-wheeler when the private bus proceeding to Puducherry from Villupuram hit them at Ariyur.

The duo sustained serious injuries and were rushed to Puducherry Government Hospital.

As the news of the accident spread, an irate mob set the bus ablaze and stoned another bus. Two fire tenders were despatched to the spot to put out the fire.
title: Bus set on fire after accident
